entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 40 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
